data_table.description: Visit 5. Subject ID, cohort status, date of discharge, and surveillance of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CFDA5A
variable.description: Cohort status (ARIC Chort, JHS Chort, Commmuinty, Neither) Q5A

variable.name: CFDA5B
variable.description: Is patient address in ARIC community surveillance catchment area? Q5B

variable.name: CFDAFLAG
variable.description: =1 IF CFDA (OR OTHER VER) IS PRESENT

variable.name: CFDA0C_DAYS
variable.description: Date of discharge (for nonfatal case) or death Q0C -- Days from Exam 1
